project(OCC_MESH_ADAPT)


set(OCC_Includes
C:/_Libs/OCC6/ros/inc
)

set(FreeCAD_LibPack_Libs
C:/_Libs/OCC6/ros/win32/lib
)

set(OCC_MESH_ADAPT_Includes
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/BRepMeshAdapt
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/MeshAlgoAdapt
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/TriangleAdapt
)


add_definitions(-DWNT -DNO_TIMER -D_CRT_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS)

include_directories(${OCC_Includes} ${OCC_MESH_ADAPT_Includes})



set(OCC_Libs
${FreeCAD_LibPack_Libs}/TKBRep.lib

)

${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/BRepMeshAdapt/BRepMeshAdapt_FastDiscret.ixx
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/BRepMeshAdapt/BRepMeshAdapt_BiPoint.ixx
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/BRepMeshAdapt/BRepMeshAdapt_ShapeTool.ixx
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/BRepMeshAdapt/BRepMeshAdapt_IncrementalMesh.ixx
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/BRepMeshAdapt/BRepMeshAdapt_Classifier.ixx
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/BRepMeshAdapt/BRepMeshAdapt_ShapeTool.jxx
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/BRepMeshAdapt/BRepMeshAdapt_FastDiscret.jxx
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/BRepMeshAdapt/BRepMeshAdapt.jxx
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/BRepMeshAdapt/BRepMeshAdapt_EdgeDiscret.jxx
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/BRepMeshAdapt/BRepMeshAdapt_SurfaceGrid.jxx
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/BRepMeshAdapt/BRepMeshAdapt_BiPoint.jxx
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/BRepMeshAdapt/BRepMeshAdapt_Edge.jxx
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/BRepMeshAdapt/BRepMeshAdapt_Triangle.jxx
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/BRepMeshAdapt/BRepMeshAdapt_Discret.jxx
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/BRepMeshAdapt/BRepMeshAdapt_Vertex.jxx
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/BRepMeshAdapt/BRepMeshAdapt_IncrementalMesh.jxx
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/BRepMeshAdapt/BRepMeshAdapt_Classifier.jxx
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/BRepMeshAdapt/BRepMeshAdapt_BiPoint.lxx
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/BRepMeshAdapt/BRepMeshAdapt_Edge.lxx
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/BRepMeshAdapt/BRepMeshAdapt_FastDiscret.lxx
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/BRepMeshAdapt/BRepMeshAdapt_ShapeTool.lxx
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/BRepMeshAdapt/BRepMeshAdapt_Vertex.lxx
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/BRepMeshAdapt/BRepMeshAdapt_Triangle.lxx
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/BRepMeshAdapt/BRepMeshAdapt_Classifier.lxx
)

set(OCC_MESH_ADAPT_SRCS
${OCC_MESH_ADAPT_TriangleAdapt_SRCS}
${OCC_MESH_ADAPT_BRepMeshAdapt_SRCS}
${OCC_MESH_ADAPT_MeshAlgoAdapt_SRCS}
${OCC_MESH_ADAPT_BREPUTILS_SRCS}
)

set(OCC_MESH_ADAPT_HDRS
${OCC_MESH_ADAPT_TriangleAdapt_HDRS}
${OCC_MESH_ADAPT_BRepMeshAdapt_HDRS}
${OCC_MESH_ADAPT_MeshAlgoAdapt_HDRS}
${OCC_MESH_ADAPT_BREPUTILS_HDRS}
)


#qt4_automoc(${Synchronisierung_SRCS} ${Synchronisierung_HDRS})

ADD_LIBRARY(OCC_MESH_ADAPT SHARED ${OCC_MESH_ADAPT_SRCS} ${OCC_MESH_ADAPT_HDRS})

target_link_libraries(OCC_MESH_ADAPT ${OCC_Libs})
